data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Turkana, Kenya.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Turkana, Kenya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Turkana, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 258,525 people in the state of Turkana who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: the state of Turkana has (about) 424,314 people who know Jesus, 258,525 people who know about him culturally, and 172,561 people who are far from Jesus.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Toposa people.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Turkana, Kenya.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Turkana, Kenya honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Turkana against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.
